question: For each item on this list, tell me if you think it is happening a lot more, somewhat more, only a little more or not more these days than five years ago: availability of movies, TV and music from different parts of the world.
raw_output:
The availability of movies, TV shows, and music from different parts of the world has significantly increased over the past five years, largely driven by the expansion of global streaming platforms, more international content being produced, and easier access through the internet. Thus, it is happening a lot more now compared to five years ago.

ANSWER: A
